EmailTemplate.description: DPS - Ove Glove made with Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Ove Glove made with Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.subject: Ove Glove made with Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in the Ove Glove made with Kevlar®. DuPont does not directly manufacture this product made with Kevlar®.
For product information, questions and quality issues about Ove Glove made with Kevlar® please contact:
JOSEPH ENTERPRISES, INC., 425 California Street, Suite 300, San Francisco, CA 94104. ph: 415-397-6992 x 102
Please visit out DuPont website which provides additional information about Nomex® or Kevlar® as well as other DuPont products. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Directories/en_US/Products_Services_Index/index.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
